channel.title: LOG glitch!?!?!
channel.description:
Alright every time i log out for like 1 min i wont be able to log back on...
I am hosting the server on a Linux red hat 7 core dedicated server, and when i host the server on my computer i never get these problems... Many people say it has to do with server but they can't fix... anyone think they know how to fix?
So basically when i log out (after being logged) on and wait for about 30-60 seconds and then when i try to log on to MY server, it does not connect! Just says, "error connecting to server"
This happens to everyone! NOT JUST ME

item.title: LOG glitch!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @pwnm30rdi3 pwnm30rdi3
item.description:
@pwnm30rdi3 wrote:

[quote=“slump40, post:6, topic:172853”]Happends to me too…

u just have to keep trying.[/quote]

Its not like that, if you keep trying it does nothing but make the server lag more!

Read full topic

item.title: LOG glitch!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @pwnm30rdi3 pwnm30rdi3
item.description:
@pwnm30rdi3 wrote:

OK YOU NEED TO READ, I am not a little noob like you… I have been coding for over 1 year and i now some shit. Now I’m not hosting my server on my fucking computer I’m hosting it on a dedicated server (please read ^^)

Now i no for a fact that restarting this dedicated server will not do anything because i have done it more then 10 times today, so you should really only post if you know the answer!

Read full topic
